title: B2B Quiz
description: A comprehensive quiz to analyze your business's online presence and provide tailored recommendations

tableOfContents.title: Table of Contents
tableOfContents.note: Feel free to navigate at your own pace‚Äîno rush!

questions.question: Please enter your business name and the city where it's located.
questions.internal_note: We'll use Business Name and City in your final report to provide local insights, such as community directories or localized promotions.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes your business type or category?
questions.internal_note: This Business Category helps shape industry-specific advice. For instance, a fast food place might need delivery service tips.

questions.question: What is the main challenge or reason you want to improve your online presence?

options.label: üöÄ I want to attract more customers or leads
üîé I'm not seeing good results from my current online efforts
‚≠ê I want to build a stronger brand presence online
‚è≤ I have no time for online advertising due to other responsibilities
‚ùó Starting online advertising feels too complicated
‚ùî I'm unsure how to get started with online marketing

questions.internal_note: Knowing the user's primary motivation helps you prioritize your recommendations (brand-building, lead-gen, time-savers, etc.).

questions.question: Are you listed in local directories (e.g., Google Business Profile, Yelp)?
questions.booster: Many businesses in [City from Q1] find that local directory listings significantly increase foot traffic and brand awareness!
questions.internal_note: Local directory listings are crucial. If "No," recommend quick steps to create or claim these listings.

questions.question: Do you currently have a business website?
questions.internal_note: A website is often the hub of online marketing. If they don't have one, consider simple web-building tools or professional services in the audit.

questions.question: Which social media platforms do you use for your business (if any)?
questions.booster: Amazing! Juggling both daily operations and social media is no small feat‚Äîyour dedication to online engagement can really pay off.
questions.internal_note: Specific platform usage influences content recommendations (e.g., reels vs. text posts vs. professional networking).

questions.question: How often do you post or update your social media channels?
questions.internal_note: Posting frequency helps you suggest scheduling tools or social media management practices if posting is sporadic.

questions.question: When it comes to social media, what is your biggest obstacle?
questions.booster: Identifying your top challenge is the first step toward conquering it. Let's focus on a solution!

options.label: ü§∑ I'm not sure where to start

questions.internal_note: This clarifies which social media pain point you should address first (content, scheduling, or analytics help).

questions.question: Do you handle your social media and online advertising by yourself, or do you pay someone to do it?

options.label: üë• I have an employee or freelancer who helps
üè¢ I outsource it to an agency or professional
üö´ I don't currently manage or run any advertising

questions.internal_note: This reveals if they need DIY solutions or suggestions for better collaboration with pros.

questions.question: Have you ever used online advertising (e.g., Facebook Ads, Google Ads) to attract more customers?

options.label: ‚è∏ Yes, in the past but not now

questions.booster: Did you know? 95% of micro and small businesses say time constraints are a major hurdle to running successful social media ads.
questions.internal_note: Indicates if they need beginner or advanced strategies for online ads.

questions.question: Did you used influencer or content creator services for your business?
questions.internal_note: We want to explore if this channel was tested by user.

questions.question: Do you offer online ordering or partner with any food delivery services (e.g., Uber Eats, DoorDash)?

options.label: üçî Yes, we have our own online ordering
üçü Yes, we partner with third-party apps

questions.internal_note: For fast-food owners, delivery or online ordering is critical. If "Not currently," highlight relevant options.

questions.question: How often do you update your online menu or announce new specials/deals?

options.label: ‚ùî Not sure how to keep it updated

questions.internal_note: Menu updates can attract repeat customers. If rarely updated, show quick ways to refresh or highlight new items online.

questions.question: Are you using photos or videos to showcase your meals on social media or delivery platforms?

options.label: üö´ No, we don't share visuals much

questions.internal_note: Visuals strongly influence fast-food engagement. Recommend easy phone photography or short video content if they're not doing this already.

questions.question: How many hours per week do you spend managing your online presence (e.g., creating posts, responding to messages)?
questions.booster: Time management is a major factor in small business success. Let's see how much you're juggling right now.
questions.internal_note: If time is limited, suggest more efficient or automated approaches.

questions.question: Which part of your online presence do you find most time-consuming or difficult to manage?

options.label: üí¨ Responding to customer inquiries and reviews
ü§î I'm not active enough for it to be time-consuming

questions.internal_note: Identifies specific tasks where user might benefit from scheduling tools, content services, or assistant help.

questions.question: If time or budget weren't an issue, which area would you prioritize first?

options.label: üìÖ Posting more regularly on social media

questions.internal_note: Reveals their ideal focus, which might inform a long-term plan if they expand resources later.

sections.title: Local Businesses Near You
sections.content:
Below are some businesses we found in [City from Q1] that might be similar to yours. This is just for reference‚Äîsee how they are positioning themselves online or offering services:

Business Name A, 123 Main St, [City from Q1]
Business Name B, 456 Oak Ave, [City from Q1]
Business Name C, 789 Pine Rd, [City from Q1]

(Use this info for ideas or potential collaboration. No question to answer here.)
sections.internal_note: This local reference showcases potential competitors or peers in the user's area, without requiring a direct response.

questions.question: Do you monitor online reviews on platforms like Google, Yelp, or Facebook?
questions.internal_note: If "No," suggest easy ways to track reviews (email alerts, free monitoring tools, etc.).

questions.question: How often do you respond to online reviews (positive or negative)?
questions.internal_note: Shows how engaged they are with customer feedback.

questions.question: How do you handle potential customers who contact you outside of regular business hours (evenings, weekends, holidays)?

options.label: ü§ñ We use automated replies or chatbots (instant response, but personal follow-up later)
üïó We respond the next business day (no automated system in place)
üìµ We don't have a system (customers must wait until we're open)
üí° I'd like help setting up an after-hours approach

questions.question: How do you typically handle negative reviews?

options.label: üòÄ I haven't had negative reviews yet

questions.internal_note: A negative feedback strategy can help turn critics into loyal customers.

questions.question: Do you ask customers to leave reviews or share their impressions of your business?
questions.internal_note: Encouraging positive reviews can boost visibility and credibility.

questions.question: Do you use any word-of-mouth (WOM) incentives (e.g., coupons, referral bonuses) to encourage customers to spread the word?
questions.internal_note: Referral incentives can be a powerful, cost-effective way to grow.

sections.title: Success Stories with Paid Advertising
sections.content:
üí° Real-Life Examples

Luigi's Pizzeria, [City from Q1]: Spent $50 on a Facebook ad‚Äîweekend orders soared 300%!

TechFix Repairs, [City from Q1]: Used Google Ads for phone repairs‚Äîgained 20 new leads in 2 days.

Bloom Florist, [City from Q1]: Ran Instagram ads for Valentine's specials‚Äîsold out in 24 hours.

These businesses leveraged targeted ads to reach local customers quickly. Imagine what a well-planned campaign could do for your [Category from Q2] in [City from Q1]!
sections.internal_note: Motivational snippet showing real-world examples of small businesses succeeding with paid ads.

questions.question: Are you satisfied with the number of leads or inquiries you receive from your online channels?
questions.internal_note: If unsatisfied, you can focus on funnel improvements or targeted campaigns in the audit.

questions.question: Do you collect any customer data (e.g., emails, phone numbers) for follow-up marketing or newsletters?

options.label: üö´ No, I don't collect any data

questions.internal_note: Shows if email marketing or CRM solutions could be recommended.

questions.question: Does your business adapt its online strategy during peak seasons, holidays, or special events (e.g., Black Friday)?

options.label: üóì Yes, we plan special promotions or focused campaigns
üö´ No, we treat all seasons the same
ü§î Not sure how to create seasonal campaigns

questions.internal_note: Shows whether they adjust marketing tactics for peak periods (holidays, busy seasons), which can significantly impact sales or traffic.

questions.question: Any other comments or specific areas you'd like to improve?
questions.placeholder: Tell us about any specific challenges or goals...
questions.internal_note: A final catch-all for unique issues or goals that might not have come up yet.

sections.title: Receive Your Personalized Report
sections.content: We are preparing #company-name report, stay tuned.

questions.question: Where should we send your personalized report or audit results?
questions.placeholder: Enter your email address or phone number for WhatsApp
questions.note: No spam, only your customized report.

additionalContent.title: Your Tailored Analysis
additionalContent.text: We're preparing your report right now by performing a live internet search and using our specially trained AI models for online advertising and business growth. We'll create a unique audit based on your [Category from Q2] in [City from Q1], using the most up-to-date data and analyzing active URLs. If you take the quiz later, results may differ because we run a fresh review each time. You'll receive one email or message‚Äîno extra mailings or spam, ever.
additionalContent.internal_note: Emphasize it's a custom and real-time analysis, which can change as their online presence evolves.

sections.title: Methodology & References
sections.preContent: #company-name business growth recipe, is just about to be finished.

mainContent.title: How we create your customized report (no answer required)
steps: Live Data Gathering ‚Äì We check current URLs, social profiles, and directory listings.
AI-driven Review ‚Äì Our specialized AI models for online advertising and growth strategies evaluate your strengths and areas for improvement.
Industry Benchmarks ‚Äì We compare your answers to best practices and competitor activities in [City from Q1] and [Category from Q2].
Tailored Recommendations ‚Äì Finally, we compile the results into a step-by-step plan specifically for your business goals.

references.title: References & Resources
links: Meta Business Help Center ‚Äì Tips and tutorials for Facebook & Instagram Ads.
Google Ads: Why Google Ads? ‚Äì Official overview of how paid search can boost business growth.
HubSpot Marketing Blog ‚Äì Articles and free tools on digital marketing, lead generation, and automation.

sections.conclusion: Thanks for completing the quiz! You'll receive your custom report soon‚Äîstay tuned!
